name: My Portfolio (Definitely not this site)
desc: My portfolio created using React, which is the site you are viewing this on.

name: Sorting Algorithm Visualiser
desc: A sorting algorithm visualiser created using the SDL library in C++. This features numerous common sorting algorithms.

name: Yawspeed
desc: A mouse hook created in C++ utilising the Windows API to allow automated spinning in video games without using the joystick of a controller.

name: YouTube Downloader
desc: A short project made with Python using the pytube library to allow the downloading of YouTube video and audio.

name: Workout Logging and Planning App
desc: Created as my third year dissertation project of University, This mobile application allows users to plan, log and create workouts including automated goal setting, activity tracking and a workout generator. This was made using the Flutter framework for Dart.

name: Recycling Sorting with the Kuka YouBot
desc: A robotics simulation of a robot (the Kuka YouBot) sorting recycling using the Copelia Sim API and Lua.

name: Get to your 9am on Time! - Text Adventure Game
desc: A comedic text adventure game made in Java with Swing where decisions and stat collections and influence many different endings.

name: Wordguess
desc: A word guessing game built with Python that grabs a random word from the internet for you to guess like in Hangman. Features difficulty settings and winrate saving.
